name: Vector
description: Vector is a lightweight tool for building observability pipelines. (With easy setup for CloudWatch!)

VECTOR_TOML_URL.description: The URL of the `vector.toml` you use to use. (Refreshed on restart! For static, provision a `vector.toml` with your app.

LOGPLEX_AUTH_USERNAME.description: The unique, private `user` part of `heroku drains:add https://user:pass@mylogdrain.herokuapp.com/logs -a myapp`.

LOGPLEX_AUTH_PASSWORD.description: The unique, private `pass` part of `heroku drains:add https://user:pass@mylogdrain.herokuapp.com/logs -a myapp`.
